title: 新约 - 路加福音(Luke) - 第 24 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 路加福音(Luke) -- 第 24 章 ( 本篇共有 24 章 )

lineList.en: Now upon the first day of the week, very early in the morning, they came unto the sepulchre, bringing the spices which they had prepared, and certain others with them.
lineList.cn: 七日的头一日，黎明的时候，那些妇女带着所豫备的香料，来到坟墓前。

lineList.en: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre.
lineList.cn: 看见石头已经从坟墓辊开了。

lineList.en: And they entered in, and found not the body of the Lord Jesus.
lineList.cn: 他们就进去，只是不见主耶稣的身体。

lineList.en: And it came to pass, as they were much perplexed thereabout, behold, two men stood by them in shining garments:
lineList.cn: 正在猜疑之间，忽然有两个人站在旁边。衣服放光。

lineList.en: And as they were afraid, and bowed down their faces to the earth, they said unto them, Why seek ye the living among the dead?
lineList.cn: 妇女们惊怕，将脸伏地。那两个人就对他们说，为什么在死人中找活人呢。

lineList.en: He is not here, but is risen: remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee,
lineList.cn: 他不在这里，已经复活了。当记念他还在加利利的时候，怎样告诉你们，

lineList.en: Saying, The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men, and be crucified, and the third day rise again.
lineList.cn: 说，人子必须被交在罪人手里，钉在十字架上，第三日复活。

lineList.en: And they remembered his words,
lineList.cn: 他们就想起耶稣的话来，

lineList.en: And returned from the sepulchre, and told all these things unto the eleven, and to all the rest.
lineList.cn: 便从坟墓那里回去，把这一切事告诉十一个使徒和其馀的人。

lineList.en: It was Mary Magdalene, and Joanna, and Mary the mother of James, and other women that were with them, which told these things unto the apostles.
lineList.cn: 那告诉使徒的，就是抹大拉的马利亚，和约亚拿，并雅各的母亲马利亚，还有与他们在一处的妇女。

lineList.en: And their words seemed to them as idle tales, and they believed them not.
lineList.cn: 他们这些话，使徒以为是胡言，就不相信。

lineList.en: Then arose Peter, and ran unto the sepulchre; and stooping down, he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves, and departed, wondering in himself at that which was come to pass.
lineList.cn: 彼得起来，跑到坟墓前，低头往里看，见细麻布独在一处，就回去了，心里希奇所成的事。

lineList.en: And, behold, two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus, which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs.
lineList.cn: 正当那日，门徒中有两个人往一个村子去，这村子名叫以马忤斯，离耶路撒冷约有二十五里。

lineList.en: And they talked together of all these things which had happened.
lineList.cn: 他们彼此谈论所遇见的这一切事。

lineList.en: And it came to pass, that, while they communed together and reasoned, Jesus himself drew near, and went with them.
lineList.cn: 正谈论相问的时候，耶稣亲自就近他们，和他们同行。

lineList.en: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him.
lineList.cn: 只是他们的眼睛迷糊了，不认识他。

lineList.en: And he said unto them, What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another, as ye walk, and are sad?
lineList.cn: 耶稣对他们说，你们走路彼此谈论的是什么事呢。他们就站住，脸上带着愁容。

lineList.en: And the one of them, whose name was Cleopas, answering said unto him, Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem, and hast not known the things which are come to pass there in these days?
lineList.cn: 二人中有一个名叫革流巴的，回答说，你在耶路撒冷作客，还不知道这几天在那里所出的事吗。

lineList.en: And he said unto them, What things? And they said unto him, Concerning Jesus of Nazareth, which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people:
lineList.cn: 耶稣说，什么事呢。他们说，就是拿撒勒人耶稣的事。他是个先知，在神和众百姓面前，说话行事都有大能。

lineList.en: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death, and have crucified him.
lineList.cn: 祭司长和我们的官府，竟把他解去定了死罪，钉在十字架上。

lineList.en: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel: and beside all this, to day is the third day since these things were done.
lineList.cn: 但我们素来所盼望要赎以色列民的就是他。不但如此，而且这事成就，现在已经三天了。

lineList.en: Yea, and certain women also of our company made us astonished, which were early at the sepulchre;
lineList.cn: 再者，我们中间有几个妇女使我们惊奇，他们清早到了坟墓那里。

lineList.en: And when they found not his body, they came, saying, that they had also seen a vision of angels, which said that he was alive.
lineList.cn: 不见他的身体，就回来告诉我们说，看见了天使显现，说他活了。

lineList.en: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre, and found it even so as the women had said: but him they saw not.
lineList.cn: 又有我们的几个人，往坟墓那里去，所遇见的，正如妇女们所说的，只是没有看见他。

lineList.en: Then he said unto them, O fools, and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken:
lineList.cn: 耶稣对他们说，无知的人哪，先知所说的一切话，你们的心，信得太迟钝了。

lineList.en: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things, and to enter into his glory?
lineList.cn: 基督这样受害，又进入他的荣耀，岂不是应当的吗。

lineList.en: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets, he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself.
lineList.cn: 于是从摩西和众先知起，凡经上所指着自己的话，都给他们讲解明白了。

lineList.en: And they drew nigh unto the village, whither they went: and he made as though he would have gone further.
lineList.cn: 将近他们所去的村子，耶稣好像还要往前行

lineList.en: But they constrained him, saying, Abide with us: for it is toward evening, and the day is far spent. And he went in to tarry with them.
lineList.cn: 他们却强留他说，时候晚了，日头已经平西了，请你同我住下吧。耶稣就进去，要同他们住下。

lineList.en: And it came to pass, as he sat at meat with them, he took bread, and blessed it, and brake, and gave to them.
lineList.cn: 到了坐席的时候，耶稣拿起饼来，祝谢了，擘开，递给他们。

lineList.en: And their eyes were opened, and they knew him; and he vanished out of their sight.
lineList.cn: 他们的眼睛明亮了，这才认出他来。忽然耶稣不见了。

lineList.en: And they said one to another, Did not our heart burn within us, while he talked with us by the way, and while he opened to us the scriptures?
lineList.cn: 他们彼此说，在路上，他和我们说话，给我们讲解圣经的时候，我们的心岂不是火热的吗。

lineList.en: And they rose up the same hour, and returned to Jerusalem, and found the eleven gathered together, and them that were with them,
lineList.cn: 他们就立时起身，回耶路撒冷去，正遇见十一个使徒，和他们的同人，聚集在一处。

lineList.en: Saying, The Lord is risen indeed, and hath appeared to Simon.
lineList.cn: 说，主果然复活，已经现给西门看了。

lineList.en: And they told what things were done in the way, and how he was known of them in breaking of bread.
lineList.cn: 两个人就把路上所遇见，和擘饼的时候怎样被他们认出来的事，都述说了一遍。

lineList.en: And as they thus spake, Jesus himself stood in the midst of them, and saith unto them, Peace be unto you.
lineList.cn: 正说这话的时候，耶稣亲自站在他们当中，说，愿你们平安。

lineList.en: But they were terrified and affrighted, and supposed that they had seen a spirit.
lineList.cn: 他们却惊慌害怕，以为所看见的是魂。

lineList.en: And he said unto them, Why are ye troubled? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts?
lineList.cn: 耶稣说，你们为什么愁烦。为什么心里起疑念呢。

lineList.en: Behold my hands and my feet, that it is I myself: handle me, and see; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have.
lineList.cn: 你们看我的手，我的脚，就知道实在是我了。摸我看看。魂无骨无肉，你们看我是有的。

lineList.en: And when he had thus spoken, he shewed them his hands and his feet.
lineList.cn: 说了这话，就把手和脚给他们看。

lineList.en: And while they yet believed not for joy, and wondered, he said unto them, Have ye here any meat?
lineList.cn: 他们正喜得不敢信，并且希奇，耶稣就说，你们这里有什么吃的没有。

lineList.en: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish, and of an honeycomb.
lineList.cn: 他们便给他一片烧鱼。有古卷在此有和一块蜜房

lineList.en: And he took it, and did eat before them.
lineList.cn: 他接过来，在他们面前吃了。

lineList.en: And he said unto them, These are the words which I spake unto you, while I was yet with you, that all things must be fulfilled, which were written in the law of Moses, and in the prophets, and in the psalms, concerning me.
lineList.cn: 耶稣对他们说，这就是我从前与你们同在之时，所告诉你们的话，说，摩西的律法，先知的书，和诗篇上所记的，凡指着我的话，都必须应验。

lineList.en: Then opened he their understanding, that they might understand the scriptures,
lineList.cn: 于是耶稣开他们的心窍，使他们能明白圣经。

lineList.en: And said unto them, Thus it is written, and thus it behoved Christ to suffer, and to rise from the dead the third day:
lineList.cn: 又对他们说，照经上所写的，基督必受害，第三日从死里复活。

lineList.en: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations, beginning at Jerusalem.
lineList.cn: 并且人要奉他的名传悔改赦罪的道，从耶路撒冷起直传到万邦。

lineList.en: And ye are witnesses of these things.
lineList.cn: 你们就是这些事的见证。

lineList.en: And, behold, I send the promise of my Father upon you: but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem, until ye be endued with power from on high.
lineList.cn: 我要将我父所应许的降在你们身上。你们要在城里等候，直到你们领受从上头来的能力。

lineList.en: And he led them out as far as to Bethany, and he lifted up his hands, and blessed them.
lineList.cn: 耶稣领他们到伯大尼的对面，就举手给他们祝福。

lineList.en: And it came to pass, while he blessed them, he was parted from them, and carried up into heaven.
lineList.cn: 正祝福的时候，他就离开他们，被带到天上去了。

lineList.en: And they worshipped him, and returned to Jerusalem with great joy:
lineList.cn: 他们就拜他，大大的欢喜，回耶路撒冷去。

lineList.en: And were continually in the temple, praising and blessing God. Amen.
lineList.cn: 常在殿里称颂神。
